find a good one Minecraft screen recorder can be a bit difficult for many players out there. To make it easier, we’ve put together this article that includes the best options for you to try.

So if you are a Minecraft gaming enthusiast, this article would be valuable to you.

Why do you need a Minecraft screen recorder?

There is no shortage of people playing Minecraft game. It doesn’t matter if you are a professional player or a beginner; It would be very interesting to record your gameplay. In general, we all love to keep some kind of record of our accomplishments.

If you can record your gameplay on Minecraft, you can also share it with friends. However, the main problem for many users is that they cannot distinguish the best option from the rest. This is especially due to the multitude of options available on the market.

The Minecraft screen recorder you choose must be able to record videos in high quality. Also, the particular tool needs to be convenient enough to make it easier to use even for a beginner.

After understanding all these challenges, we have come up with this article highlighting the best screen recorders for Minecraft. So read on and choose the best screen recorder.

PS: If you are looking for the best 4 Player Switch Games, just click to have a try.

List of Best Tools to Record Minecraft on PC and Mac

In this section of our article, we will show you the best options that you can use to record Minecraft.

Besides, if you are looking to make a saddle in Minecraft and How to Record Clash Royale, here are the best fixes for you.

01. Wondershare Demo Creator [Wahl des Herausgebers]

Wondershare DemoCreator has reached the top position on this list for many obvious reasons. This special software can be used to record your Minecraft gameplay in high quality videos.

One of the most important features of DemoCreator is its ease of use. Even if you are a newbie, you can use this tool and click your gameplay with a single click. In addition to screen recording, you can also use the same tool to record webcams and voiceovers.

To add more value to this tool, it also includes many useful tools. You can use these tools to create wonderful stories. This is exactly why many experts consider this tool to be the best Minecraft screen recorder out there.

Also, this tool allows you to embed many effects in the already recorded files.

advantages

  • With this screen recorder, you can record a webcam with a screen at the same time.
  • It is packed with many smart editing tools that add a professional touch to the recorded video.
  • There are various effects and annotation tools to record your gameplay.
  • It’s totally free to record screens.
  • DemoCreator even separates the audio file from the video file after the recording is complete.

Disadvantages

  • Wondershare DemoCreator free version has a watermark.

Get Wondershare DemoCreator

02. Bandicam (compatible with Windows)

The next Minecraft recording software that we prefer is Bandicam. This application is known for its amazing collection of editing options. In fact, it can work in different modes to meet your needs. If necessary, you can use the same tool to record only some areas instead of recording the entire screen.

Even if you record the entire screen, the quality of the video will not be lost. When you switch Bandicam to record mode, the frame rate will be displayed on the screen. However, if this is not required, you can customize the UI so that you cannot see the framerate.

advantages

  • With Bandicam, you can easily save videos in MP4 or AVI file format.
  • You have the option to adjust the size of the recording screen based on your needs.

Disadvantages

  • It only works with Windows.

03. ShadowPlay (compatible with Windows)

Are you trying to take screenshots? Or do you want to record high-quality videos of your Minecraft gameplay? If not, would you like to enjoy live streams? If so, Shadow Play would be an excellent option that offers great content quality and many other advanced features. This tool can also record all videos in the background. It also comes with hotkey functionality.

advantages

  • It has a 4K recording facility for die-hard Minecraft enthusiasts.
  • It works very smoothly and therefore does not affect the performance of your system.

Disadvantages

  • High bandwidth is required for broadcasting purposes.

04. Game DVR (Support Windows 10)

Game DVR can be considered as the ideal Xbox app that works smoothly on the Windows platform as well. In fact, this tool works well on Windows 10 OS. If you’re expecting a Minecraft screen recorder that records gameplays with great quality, don’t miss this tool.

This tool has a special option called Game Bar Popup. It appears on the device screen when you press the Windows key and the “G” key at the same time. One of the unique features is that it can be used to record those games with high definition. In fact, it can record videos at 1080p and 720p settings.

advantages

  • This tool can also capture screenshots in addition to videos.
  • You can use the “Hotkeys” feature to improve the overall performance of the application.
  • The recording process is so smooth and there are no lags in recording.

Disadvantages

  • It doesn’t have advanced features compared to the other apps in this list.

Again, the full Openshot vs. Shotcut comparison is here for your reference.

05. OBS (For Windows and Mac operating systems)

This is a Minecraft screen recorder with a classic user interface. It works on Windows, Mac, and Linux, so you don’t have to worry about compatibility. Well, one of the most important things related to OBS is that it is an open source tool.

That means you can download and use it completely free without experiencing any limitations. OBS Studio has all the facilities to record screen easily. Also, you can stream and edit videos without much trouble. Thanks to the interactive interface of this particular application, it can be used even by novice users.

advantages

  • This tool is an open source application, so anyone can download and use it without any limitation.
  • You can record videos of unlimited length.

Disadvantages

  • This tool causes a higher compression of the recorded videos.

06. Screenflick (compatible with Mac)

This is another handy screen recording tool designed to work with macOS. It offers exceptionally high performance compared to many other apps on the market. It can even record gameplay audio for easier sharing.

In general, Screenflick is regarded as a popular choice among professionals dedicated to various tasks. For example, it works perfectly for video chatting, training, etc. in addition to capturing games.

advantages

  • This program offers an excellent user-friendly interface with perfectly optimized features.
  • Screenflick provides one-click audio controls.

Disadvantages

  • This tool does not allow users to change the quality of the recorded videos.

07. ScreenFlow (compatible with macOS)

ScreenFlow is another program compatible with macOS. This tool has excellent recording capabilities, so it can record your Minecraft game very well. It can even record the audio files.

In addition, it makes it easier for users to record from multi-channel audio devices, iOS devices, video cameras, external microphones, etc. So, this tool offers greater versatility.

advantages

  • This tool is ideal for professional screen recording tasks thanks to its powerful set of tools.
  • It includes a variety of editing tools, animation, transitions, text, music, etc.
  • ScreenFlow is compatible with all common file formats.
  • You can use it to share your videos across all major social media platforms.

Disadvantages

  • This tool does not have built-in templates.
  • This application is very expensive, especially if you want access to the full version.

08. Mobizen Screen Recorder

Here is another Minecraft screen recorder specially designed to be compatible with Android operating system. It includes a set of easy-to-use tools. Mobizen can also be accessed for free, and yet it offers an excellent variety of features.

In fact, Mobizen Screen Recorder allows you to remove watermark from recorded videos for free. It also allows taking screenshots.

advantages

  • Very comfortable user interface.
  • It offers you the possibility to record, edit and record completely free of charge.
  • It has many customization options.
  • Compatible with high video specifications like 1080p resolution, 60FS, etc.

Disadvantages

  • It shows laggy performance for some users. Otherwise, we could not find any significant disadvantages of this tool.

09. AZ screen recorder

AZ Screen Recorder is a handy and efficient tool that offers excellent recording services, especially for Minecraft enthusiasts. It also offers an ad-free environment. You can use this tool for free and with no time limit.

In addition, it offers you the possibility to record videos without watermark. Another great thing related to this tool is that it does not require root access to the device.

advantages

  • You can use it to record videos in HD and FHD quality.
  • This tool allows you to record clear audio so you can hear the sound effects very well.

Disadvantages

  • Many users say that it crashes frequently.

10. AirShou

AirShou is another powerful Minecraft recording software specially designed for iOS platform. It is equipped with many advanced features so that you can record any fast-moving action game. This tool does not cause any quality loss. The tool’s settings and features are easy to find.

advantages

  • Facilitates direct streaming (with Shou. TV).
  • Very impressive customization options.

Disadvantages

  • An annoying red bar appears at the top of the screen when you’re recording something.

So that is our list of the best screen recorders for Minecraft gameplay. You can go through this list and choose the most suitable one Minecraft screen recorder that meets your requirement.
